videos.description: Iowa's Luka Garza pours in 16 points, while also blocking 3 shots in the first half against North Carolina Central.

videos.description: Iowa big man Luka Garza gets the ball in the post and sinks a one-legged fadeaway jumper.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Garza knocks down Dirk-like fadeaway) 2020/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Garza knocks down Dirk-like fadeaway
